context: A vase was broken in the museum at 3 PM. Three people were near the exhibit.

characters.name: Alice
characters.statement: I was in the library the whole time.

characters.name: Ben
characters.statement: I saw Charlie near the vase just before it broke.

characters.name: Charlie
characters.statement: Ben and I were together playing chess.

context: Someone stole a lunchbox from the kitchen. Only three people had access.

characters.name: Dina
characters.statement: I don’t even like that kind of food.

characters.name: Eli
characters.statement: Frank was the last person I saw near the kitchen.

characters.name: Frank
characters.statement: Eli went in after me.

context: A mysterious text message was sent from an unknown phone. The phone was found on a desk.

characters.name: Gina
characters.statement: I’ve never seen that phone before.

characters.name: Hank
characters.statement: I saw Gina pick something up from the desk.

characters.name: Ivan
characters.statement: I was in the garden all morning.

context: The whiteboard marker went missing before the math class.

characters.name: Jake
characters.statement: I borrowed it yesterday and returned it.

characters.name: Kira
characters.statement: Liam was near the supply shelf just before the class.

characters.name: Liam
characters.statement: I wasn’t even in school today.

context: During the fire drill, someone pulled the alarm without cause.

characters.name: Maya
characters.statement: Nina and I were together in the library.

characters.name: Nina
characters.statement: I was alone during the drill.

characters.name: Oscar
characters.statement: I saw Maya near the alarm panel.

context: A painting in the hallway was found flipped upside down.

characters.name: Pete
characters.statement: I was taking photos in the hallway.

characters.name: Quinn
characters.statement: I fixed the painting when I saw it.

characters.name: Rhea
characters.statement: Pete knocked into it by mistake.

context: A surprise party was ruined when someone leaked it.

characters.name: Sam
characters.statement: Tina and Uma were whispering yesterday.

characters.name: Tina
characters.statement: Uma told me she wouldn’t tell anyone.

characters.name: Uma
characters.statement: I never knew about the surprise party.

context: A laptop in the lab was found with deleted project files.

characters.name: Victor
characters.statement: Wendy logged in last before the files were gone.

characters.name: Wendy
characters.statement: Xander borrowed my login info.

characters.name: Xander
characters.statement: I only used my own account.

context: A classroom door was left unlocked overnight.

characters.name: Yara
characters.statement: Zane was supposed to check it before leaving.

characters.name: Zane
characters.statement: I checked all doors, including that one.

characters.name: Aaron
characters.statement: I saw Zane leave early.

context: During recess, a basketball went missing.

characters.name: Bella
characters.statement: I saw Caleb put it back in the storage.

characters.name: Caleb
characters.statement: I left it on the bench.

characters.name: Derek
characters.statement: Bella took it after the game.
